def domino_reaction(s):
    return s.replace("|", "/", min(len(s.split(" ")[0]), len(s.split("/")[0])))

def domino_reaction(stg):
    return stg.replace("|", "/", len(stg) - len(stg.lstrip("|")))

def domino_reaction(s):
    return s.replace("|", "/", min([s.find(d) if s.find(d)!=-1 else len(s)  for d in " /"]) )
